Post-doctoral Fellow in Theoretical Computer Science Institute of Mathematical Sciences Advisors: Saket Saurabh and Venkatesh Raman 2012-16. PhD in Computer Science and Engineering Indian Institute of Technology Madras Advisor: N. S. Narayanaswamy Thesis: Approximation and Parameterized Algorithms for Finding Hitting Sets 2010-12. MS (by Research) Indian Institute of Technology Madras Advisor: N. S. Narayanaswamy Thesis: r-Partization and Above Guarantee Vertex Cover 2009. System Engineer Temenos India Private Limited, Chennai 2007-08. Programmer Analyst Cognizant Technology Solutions, Chennai 2003-07. B.E in Computer Science and Engineering SSN College of Engineering, Anna University, Chennai Research I work in the broad area of graph theory and algorithms with a focus on designing efficient algorithms for various combinatorial optimization problems on graphs. My current focus is in the areas of parameterized and approximation algorithms for computationally intractable problems.
